name: Caulophyllum
Relationship: Incompatible: Coffea.Compare: Viol. Odor. (rheumatic carpal and metacarpal joints); Cimicif.; Sepia; Pulsat.; Gels.

Female: Spasmodic and severe pains, which fly in all directions; shivering, without progress: false pains
Revives labor pains and furthers progress of labor
Dysmenorrhoea, with pains flying to other parts of body
Skin: Discoloration of skin in women with menstrual and uterine disorder
Extremities: Erratic pains, changing place every few minutes
Severe drawing, erratic pain and stiffness in small joints, fingers, toes, ankles, etc. aching in wrists

details: This is a woman's remedy. Want of tonicity of the womb. During labor, when the pains are deficient and the patient is exhausted and fretful. Besides, it has a special affinity for the smaller joints. Thrush, locally and internally.
